QuestData.Title: The Ruins of Guo-Lai
QuestData.Description: According to Zhi the Harmonious, the mogu are moving into the Vale from the Ruins of Guo-Lai to the west.$B$BI sent Anji and Kun to investigate the situation, but they have not yet returned.$B$BI need a capable $c like you to go check on them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Anji Autumnlight at the Ruins of Guo-Lai in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
